Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with Urea Cycle Disorders through targeted next-generation sequencing.
Container: EDTA tube (for blood) or other appropriate specimen collection container
Equipment: DNA Extraction Kit, PCR Amplification Kit, Qubit or NanoDrop Spectrophotometer, Thermal Cycler, Agarose Gel Electrophoresis System, Next-Generation Sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq)
